item.title: Mhm.. Now what? Help?
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

Ok now… I went into my Login.Java (508 server) and i changed the name to mine so when i log in i SHOULD be admin… I compiled and i am not admin… Here is what i have…

        if (p.username.equals("Brian")) {
            p.rights = 2;
        }
        if (p.username.equals("Duff Duff")) {
            p.rights = 1;
        }

        p.stream.writeByte(returnCode);
        p.stream.writeByte(p.rights);
        p.stream.writeByte(0);
        p.stream.writeByte(0);
        p.stream.writeByte(0);
        p.stream.writeByte(1);
        p.stream.writeByte(0);
        p.stream.writeByte(p.playerId);
        p.stream.writeByte(0);
        directFlushStream(p);
        if (p.teleportToX == -1 && p.teleportToY == -1) {
            p.setCoords(3212, 3465, 0);
        }

Any ideas? Also…

I need to know how to change the max combat on my server… Currently its 114 and i want it to be 126… Any ideas again? :S Thanks for all your help if you do.

Read full topic
